hook.text: Coca-Cola's holiday ads haven't changed in decades. That's not lazinessâ€”it's strategy.

buildup.text: Nostalgia triggers warm emotions that make people spend more freely.

discovery.text: Nostalgic consumers value experiences over money and pay premium prices willingly.

twist.text: You don't need to have lived through an era to feel nostalgic for it.

climax.text: Gen Z craves 90s aesthetics they never experienced. The feeling matters, not the memory.

punchline.text: Nostalgia sells a past that never quite existed.

quiz.question: Why does nostalgia marketing work even on younger audiences?
options: The emotional feeling matters more than personal memory
Young people research history before buying
Nostalgia only works on older demographics
